channel.title: [CRASH] Surface Tension, fighting the helicopter
channel.description: [SPOILERS AHEAD!] While fighting the helicopter with the rocket launcher on the cliff, the game crashed a total of 3 times before I managed to complete the section undisturbed and move on. I can't tell exactly if it crashed in the moment I was firing a rocket, the helicopter was attacking, or I was taking damage: it happened so unexpectedly in these frenzy moments that I can't remember. I attached the 3 minidumps for you to have a look. hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_18T13_42_17C0.mdmp (91.9 KB) hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_18T18_26_39C0.mdmp (95.6 KB) hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_18T18_28_16C0.mdmp (94.4 KB)

item.title: [CRASH] Surface Tension, fighting the helicopter
item.dc:creator: Osckar
item.description:
[EN/IN]
Finally I’ve been through, I had to reduce the screen resolution to 1152x768 and turn off all effects and put the easy level of difficulty and I have been blessed down the helicopter and I can continue my work of death and destruction: D.

[ES/SP]
Al fin lo he pasado, he tenido que reducir la resolución de la pantalla a 1152x768 y desactivar todos los efectos gráficos y poner el nivel fácil de dificultad para poder derribar el dichoso helicoptero y ahora ya puedo seguir con mi tarea de muerte y destrucción .

Read full topic

item.description:
So I’m not the only one.

Only with me it’s an outright driver crash. Lovely.

item.title: [CRASH] Surface Tension, fighting the helicopter
item.dc:creator: Osckar
item.description:
Exactly, when the helicopter is on flames i shot the, i suppose, last rocket to take down it, and at the time the heli should explode what explode is the game! :fffuuu:

I have Windows Vista Home Premium SP2
Quadcore intel Q6600
4 GB RAM
ATI Radeon 4800HD

So please, Superman, help me!!!

Read full topic

item.title: [CRASH] Surface Tension, fighting the helicopter
item.dc:creator: Giazzo
item.description:
[SPOILERS AHEAD!]

While fighting the helicopter with the rocket launcher on the cliff, the game crashed a total of 3 times before I managed to complete the section undisturbed and move on.
I can’t tell exactly if it crashed in the moment I was firing a rocket, the helicopter was attacking, or I was taking damage: it happened so unexpectedly in these frenzy moments that I can’t remember.

I attached the 3 minidumps for you to have a look.
hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_18T13_42_17C0.mdmp (91.9 KB)
hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_18T18_26_39C0.mdmp (95.6 KB)
